content:
Hello,
There are plenty of FHIR examples in the PAS implementation guide, but I am having trouble locating X12 examples. Specifically, X12 response examples that need to be mapped back to FHIR. I have access to the X12 Glass portal, but did not see any examples in there specific to a prior auth request/inquiry response. Does anyone know if there are any examples available somewhere? Thanks!
@Jean Duteau @MaryKay McDaniel

@Rob Brull
X12 examples can be found on their website at: X12.org | Resources | X12 EDI Examples

Out there right now are the 8010 version, but other than the version should work, if not, let me know.
Perfect! Thank you both @MaryKay McDaniel and @Lloyd McKenzie .
